page.title: 12Lochside Gala.
page.content: This year I was chosen as{Lochside {Gala Queen.} I was very excited and nervous as I had to wear a long dress, a cloak and a crown. At last the big day came but unfortunately it was raining. In spite of the bad weather many people lined the streets, waving and cheering as I rode past in a horse drawn carriage. The procession was led by{Killoch Colliery Pipe Band, then came my carriage followed by the brightly coloured floats of the{Boys' {Brigade, Majorettes and Youth Club. When we reached the church I declar_ ed the fete which had all sorts of stalls open.The army and fire brigade put on displays and there were games for children. All the money raised is used to make our area a better place. Although it was a wet day everyone enjoyed themselves and went home wet but happy.
